main event: A family in York, Pennsylvania observed a grayish-white oval-shaped saucer that hovered over the trees and appeared to be about 40 to 50 feet in diameter.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 25 minutes and the object hovered almost stationary before moving with a rocking motion., The report notes that no sound was heard from the object., Two other individuals were present during the sighting besides the family., The object was described as having a brilliant light and was reported in a local newspaper., The observer reported lights in a triangular formation that did not correspond to known aircraft lighting.
witness description: A family and two other individuals present.
